description:
runtime: avoid malloc during malloc

A fault during malloc might lead to the program's
first call to findfunc, which would in turn call malloc.
Don't do that.

Fixes issue 1777.

runtime: avoid malloc during malloc

A fault during malloc might lead to the program's
first call to findfunc, which would in turn call malloc.
Don't do that.

Fixes issue 1777.
